alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 04 at 3:46AM MST until January 04 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County and Rampart Range Below 7400 Feet. The greatest risk of high winds will be west of I-25, especially the Manitou Springs, Cheyenne Mountain and Fort Carson areas. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST today. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages will be possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
